Package game.items.consumables

Class Bloodberry

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.consumables.Bloodberry
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, ConsumeAbility, PlayerSell
public class Bloodberry
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
implements PlayerSell, ConsumeAbility
A class representing a Bloodberry item that can be consumed by an actor. This item can be eaten to restore the actor's health.

  • Field Details

    • MERCHANT_BLOODBERRY_BUYING_PRICE

      public static final int MERCHANT_BLOODBERRY_BUYING_PRICE
      The buying price of a Bloodberry when sold to a merchant.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • HEALTH_ADD

      public static final int HEALTH_ADD
      The amount of health points that will be added to an actor's health when they consume a Bloodberry. Consuming a Bloodberry restores this amount of health to the actor.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Bloodberry

      public Bloodberry()
      Constructor to create a Bloodberry. Initializes the name, display character, and portability of the item.

  • Method Details

    • allowableActions

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList allowableActions​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor owner)
      Returns a list of allowable actions that the Bloodberry can perform for the owner actor. It includes the EatBerryAction to consume the Bloodberry and restore health.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
      Parameters:
      owner - The actor who owns the Bloodberry.
      Returns:
      A list of allowable actions for the owner actor.

    • allowableActions

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList allowableActions​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor otherActor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Location location)
      Returns a list of allowable actions for the Bloodberry when it's in a location. It includes the SellAction against other actors (who have MERCHANT status) at the location.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
      Parameters:
      otherActor - The actor to perform actions on.
      location - The location where the Bloodberry is.
      Returns:
      A list of allowable actions.

    • playerSellItem

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action playerSellItem​(int sellingPrice)
      Create a Sell action for selling the Bloodberry to another actor.
      Specified by:

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
